verbose_text: To determine the role of Tfam in Tregs in tumor immunity, we crossed Tfam fl/fl mice with Foxp3 eGFP-Cre-ERT2 mice (whose Cre nuclear localization and subsequent gene deletion were induced by tamoxifen) to specifically and inducibly delete Tfam in Tregs and subsequently challenged the mice with B16-OVA (XREF_FIG).
evidence: localization and subsequent gene deletion were induced by tamoxifen
